title: Crab Basics
description: Test your knowledge about different crab species

questions.question: Which crab species is known for carrying shells on its back?
questions.explanation: Hermit crabs carry empty shells to protect their soft bodies!

questions.question: What makes fiddler crabs special?
questions.explanation: Male fiddler crabs have one oversized claw that they wave to communicate!

questions.question: Which crab is the fastest runner?
questions.explanation: Ghost crabs can run up to 10 mph on the beach!

questions.question: What is special about pea crabs?
questions.explanation: Pea crabs are tiny hitchhikers that live inside oysters and mussels!

questions.question: Where do king crabs live?
questions.explanation: King crabs live in cold, deep ocean waters where it's dark and chilly!

questions.question: What habitat do shore crabs prefer?
questions.explanation: Shore crabs love rocky tide pools where they can hide under stones!

questions.question: Where can you find mangrove crabs?
questions.explanation: Mangrove crabs live in mangrove forests and can climb trees up to 6 feet high!

questions.question: What makes snow crabs special?
questions.explanation: Snow crabs have special proteins that prevent their blood from freezing in Arctic waters!

title: Crab Anatomy
description: Match crab body parts with their names

questions.question: What do crabs use their claws for?
questions.explanation: Crabs use their claws to catch food, defend themselves, and communicate!

questions.question: How many legs do crabs have?
questions.explanation: Crabs have 10 legs total - 8 walking legs plus 2 claws!

questions.question: What makes spider crabs unique?
questions.explanation: Spider crabs have the longest legs of any crab, with some spanning up to 12 feet across!

title: Amazing Crabs
description: Discover the most fascinating crab behaviors and adaptations

questions.question: What makes horseshoe crabs special?
questions.explanation: Horseshoe crabs are living fossils that have been around for 450 million years - older than dinosaurs!

questions.question: What do decorator crabs do?
questions.explanation: Decorator crabs are fashionistas that attach seaweeds and sponges to their shells for camouflage!

questions.question: What makes boxer crabs unique?

options.text: They can box with their claws
They hold sea anemones as weapons

questions.explanation: Boxer crabs hold sea anemones in their claws like boxing gloves for defense - they're martial artists!

questions.question: What can coconut crabs do?

options.text: They climb trees and crack coconuts

questions.explanation: Coconut crabs are the largest land crabs and can climb palm trees to steal and crack coconuts!
